title: Person Of Interest Soundtrack: 4x22 The Correction
author: FringeMusic107
comment: The best finale of all series. Honestly I didn't think Elias would die.

Themes used:
0:00 Control's theme
0:17 Samaritan's theme
0:29 Reese's theme
the season finale was epic.. thanks for the soundtrack
the part mix machine's ,Samaritan's and Finch's theme is awesome

Truly, spectacular, Djawadi really needs to release his work more often. Thanks for the video.
Though I didn't hear one part that I REALLY wanted to hear (or I might be deaf and don't recognize it).
(Spoilers)
description: Whew! How 'bout that season finale? Soundtrack from Person Of Interest episode 4x22 "YHWH". Composed by Ramin Djawadi.
